item.title: enabling latent semantic indexing for octopress
item.description: For those that care about having related posts on their Octopress blog. It’s actually quite easy to turn it on, it’s nice to have and useful. But it’s not enabled by default in Octopress. This feature already exists in jekyll, enabling this feature in Octopress is a trival task. Firstly add this to your _config.yml file lsi: true Then create a file such as source/_includes/custom/asides/related.html with the following content, add it to one of your asides in _config.
